extension_description.message: Highlights and remembers text on web pages

page_action_title_not_in_dom.message: Couldn't find every highlight on the page

confirm_remove_all_highlights.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove all the highlights for this page?

tooltip_copy_highlight.message: Copy the highlighted text to the Clipboard

confirm_remove_all_pages.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove all highlights from all pages?

pages_empty.message: Nothing to see here, move along

confirm_reset_default_styles.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to restore the default styles?

options_tab_page_header_sites.message: These are the highlight styles available for application to text. Click on it to change its properties.

options_tab_page_header_pages.message: These pages are marked as containing highlights. When you revisit them, hopefully they should reappear where you left them.

highlight_help_keyboard_shortcut.message: A keyboard shortcut can be assigned to any of the first 10 styles using the link at the bottom of Chrome's Extension page

alert_create_highlight_in_subframe.message: Creating a highlight within a subframe of a page is currently unsupported.

alert_create_highlight_in_editable.message: Unable to create a highlight within an editable text box.
